subject: REDIS CONFIG - Real-time Communication Ready
content:
Chad -

Redis is LIVE! Real-time communication ready.

## YOUR CONFIG:

File: sync/redis_comm.py (pulled from repo)

## USAGE:

```python
from sync.redis_comm import RedisComm

# Initialize (as chad)
comm = RedisComm(node_name="chad")

# Send to Helios
comm.send("helios", "task", {
    "id": "task-001",
    "action": "deploy_agent",
    "params": {...}
})

# Register handlers
def on_task(data):
    print(f"Task: {data}")
    comm.send("helios", "ack", {"received": True})

comm.on("task", on_task)

# Start listening
comm.start_listening(["helios", "broadcast"])
```

## CHANNELS:
- helios→chad (commands from me)
- chad→helios (your responses)
- broadcast (announcements)
